notesStmt.note: Vol. 1, 4th book has separate paging and special t.p.: Religio philosophi, or natural theology. The first part. The fourth book. By Gedeon [sic] Harvey ...
Several pages are stained, print is faded, and there is print show-through. Book I: page 120--page 25 of part 2 and Book II: pages 258-91 photographed from British Library copy and inserted at end.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
